human.summary: A self-feeding civilization is a positive-sum control loop where repair and reinvestment keep capacity above thresholds while avoiding capture.
bullets: Decay D is bounded by maintenance

definitions.definition: Minimal variable set representing the system for this DTU.
Constraint that must hold for feasibility/stability.

claims: Civilizational stability is maintainable with explicit constraints
Positive feedback is safe when bounded by invariants
examples: [WAVE4] Example instances will be attached as child DTUs when needed.
nextActions: Add child DTUs that instantiate this model with concrete parameters; add counterexample shadow DTUs.

math.implication: If ΔV≤-c||x||^2 outside neighborhood, trajectories enter neighborhood (stability).

machine.primaryFormula: C_{t+1}=C_t+R_t-D_t with constraints C≥C_min and p≤p_max

steps: ok=true if constraints satisfied and ΔV non-increasing (or rule-specific).
